meanings.definition: Convalescents (noun): People recovering from illness or injury.
meanings.sent1: The convalescents in the hospital are slowly regaining their strength.
meanings.sent2: The convalescents were advised to take it easy and get plenty of rest.
meanings.sent3: The convalescents joked about starting a race to see who could walk the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The community center organized a support group for convalescents to share their experiences.
meanings.sent5: The doctor recommended a special diet for convalescents to aid in their recovery.

meanings.definition: Convalescents (adjective): Pertaining to or suitable for those recovering from illness or injury.
meanings.sent1: The hospital room was equipped with convalescent beds for the recovering patients.
meanings.sent2: The convalescent ward was filled with soothing colors and comfortable furniture.
meanings.sent3: The convalescent pets at the shelter received extra care and attention.
meanings.sent4: The convalescent home provided a peaceful environment for residents to recuperate.
meanings.sent5: The convalescent program offered gentle exercises to help patients regain their strength.
